issue.title: [Benchmarking][Dataset] Benchmark Parquet read performance with S3File
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8151](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8151). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should establish a performance baseline with the current S3File implementation and Parquet reader before proceeding with work like PARQUET-1698.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8151?focusedCommentId=17067573) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
